title: Looking for ranked players to learn with  bronze/silver
body:
Playing on a silver acc with a friend and looking for other players to help learn the game and rank up. Want to be able to play regularly and make friends :D
Add me - Boosted Pooh
Main acc is gold 5 :)

replies.body: I hear you are quite toxic and flame players in game from anonymous sources.. how do you respond to these allegations?{{item:3070}}
I would like to give this a try too, may I?
I would like to join in if possible
